General.Name: Asia Pacific Telecom Co Ltd
General.Description: Asia Pacific Telecom Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunication services to personal and business users primarily in Taiwan. Its services include mobile and fixed line data and voice communication services. The company also sells mobile phones. Asia Pacific Telecom Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
